title: Wow, I REALLY like Ashe's new voicelines!
body: Wow. She changed from a character I didn't like to a character I want to play.

replies.body:
Thanks!    
Was trying to make her still an idealist, but a bit conflicted about what she must do, worried about the outcomes, and respectful to her nation's customs.

why are you nut "red" like a rioter?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

You wrote those? They're pretty good, they actually made me want to play her.
i hate em. too fuckin long. glad i play with muted voices
